name: 0day.kiev.ua cleaner
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("0day.kiev.ua") {
   iframe,
   noscript,
   object,
   param,
   embed,
   a[target="_top"],
   a[href*="act=Reg"],
   *[src*="/swfobject"],
   *[href*="/swfobject"],
   *[href*="adfox"],
   *[src*="adfox"],
   *[href*="/www/delivery/"],
   *[src*="/www/delivery/"],
   *[src*="mobox.org.ua"],
   *[href*="mobox.org.ua"],
   div[id^="pmc_"],
   div[id^="bn_"],
   div[id^="beacon_"],
   div[id^="ox_"],
   div[id^="MarketGid"],
   div[id^="tradeone_"],
   div[id^="fl_div"],
   div[id^="tradeone_"],
   div[id^="cenovik_"],
   div[style*="Z-INDEX"],
   div[style*="z-index"],
   #samsung_banner,
   .mctable,
   .mctitle,
   .mcdesc,
   center > font[size="2"] > b,
   center > b > font[size="2"],
   a[href*="100casino.net"],
   *[src*="js.tradeone.com.ua"]
      { display: none !important; }

   td[bgcolor="#6F7984"]
      { width: 100% !important; }
}
